page.title: 13CRIME IN SHEERNESS
page.content: IN{SHEERNESS}THERE IS 1{MAIN {POLICE STATION}MANNED BY 1 CHIEF INSPECTOR,4 INSPECTORS, 6 SERGEANTS,34 POLICE CONSTABLES INCLUDING 5 WOMEN CONSTABLES. THEY ARE 3 SHORT OF STRENGTH. THE BREAK DOWN OF CRIME IN SHEERNESS IS AS FOLLOWS{MUGGINGS _1% {THEFT OVER 50% MURDERS 0% ASSAULT 20% {BURGLARIES 20%.}THERE WERE 120 {ACCIDENTS}REPORTED IN THE FIRST 6 MONTHS OF 1985.THERE ARE 27{ARRESTS PER WEEK. 450 ARRESTS PER ANNUM ARE FOR THEFT. THEY HAVE 4 FORD ESCORTS,2 KAWASAKI MOTORBIKES,1 TRANSIT PRISON VAN AND 1 LANDROVER.IT IS THE ONLY ONE IN THE KENT SUB-DIVISION BECAUSE OF THE UNMETTLED ROADS. THERE ARE NO PARTICULAR TYPES OF CRIMINAL BUT MOST ARRESTS ARE OF MEN AGED BETWEEN 14-24 YEARS.
